title: Did Mexico sign a large trade deal with Argentina to avenge Trump's plans for the border wall?
subtitle: Mexico is conducting trade talks with Argentina, but no deal has been finalized; the cost to American farmers is likely to be lower than the amount claimed.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In response to Donald Trump's plan for the border wall, Mexico will soon move all its imports of maize, rice, soy and wheat from the United States to Argentina.
